H0.text: What year did E.T. Hit the cinema screen. 1980

H1.text: What year did E.T. Hit the cinema screen. 1981

H2.text: What year did E.T. Hit the cinema screen. 1983

H3.text: What year did E.T. Hit the cinema screen. 1982

A4.text: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial (or simply E.T.) is a 1982 American science fiction film produced and directed by Steven Spielberg

A5.text: E.T. premiered as the closing film of the Cannes Film Festival on May 26, 1982
